channel.title: FrameWorks+ - Free HTML Starter Templates
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]FrameWorks+[/size]
[size=14pt]What is it?[/size]
[size=12pt]FrameWorks+ is a website for users to go on to download free starter frameworks used with either BootStrap, Foundation or Skeleton. I will be releasing weekly templates on the site, but others can submit there own template to me and it would be made available for download! The submissions from other users do not require the use of bootstrap, foundation, or skeleton.[/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]What is the purpose?[/size]
[size=12pt]The purpose of this project is mainly for learning purposes. I dont really expect this project to be successful since users can just Google a template and begin from there. But the positive thing is that the use of bootstrap, foundation, or skeleton is that templates are then easily customizable, and it gives them a good responsive website.[/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Features[/size]
[center][size=12pt]Free Downloadable Templates User Submission of custom template Template Voter (Using Node.js)[/size][/center]
[size=14pt]Pictures (Not the whole website)[/size]
[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/15/99pj.png[/img]
[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/69/yfqs.png[/img]
[center][size=17pt]Tell me what you think! And More Updates Coming Soon! :D[/size][/center]
